snippet: All members of China’s Politburo Standing Committee, the group of politicians who rule the country, have close connections with former leaders. The top two figures of the new administration were also part of the previous government.
lead_paragraph: All members of China’s Politburo Standing Committee, the group of politicians who rule the country, have close connections with former leaders. The top two figures of the new administration were also part of the previous government.

headline.seo: The New Members of China’s Ruling Body
headline.main: The New Members of China’s Ruling Body

keywords.value: Politburo Standing Committee of the Communist Party of China
